Snail Racing Tour: Create a racing tour featuring snails from around the world. Participants can train their snails to compete in races and win prizes.
Snail Obstacle Course: Create an obstacle course that snails can navigate, featuring hurdles, tunnels, and other challenges.
Snail Yoga: Develop a yoga class specifically for snails, teaching them stretching and breathing techniques to improve their mobility and overall well-being.
Snail Cooking Class: Offer a cooking class where participants can learn how to cook dishes that feature snails as the main ingredient.
Snail Art Gallery: Create an art gallery featuring artwork made by snails, including sculptures, paintings, and other creative expressions.
